name: Scrapped (jhonamath)
description:
Scrapped is a post apocaliptical adventure, where you have to save the world from the aliens.

You'll catch your enemies to mix them together, for the creation of a massive weapon of destruction, to save the world.

But... who would be the real enemy at the end?  

This is agame created in 48hrs for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, with the topic "Joined Together"

We hope you enjoy it!

Developers:

@IcedCris
@JhonaMath
